original_text: Then the nations that still live around you will see what has happened. They will know that I, the Lord, have mended the broken cities. They will know that I have planted crops again in the fields that were empty. I, the Lord, have said this, and I will do it!”
korean_text: 너희 사방에 남은 이방 사람이 나 여호와가 무너진 곳을 건축하며 황폐한 자리에 심은 줄을 알리라 나 여호와가 말하였으니 이루리라

sentences.original_text: Then the nations that still live around you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신 주변에 여전히 사는 나라들이

sentences.original_text: that I, the Lord, have mended the broken cities
sentences.korean_translation: 나 주께서 무너진 도시들을 수리했다는 것을

sentences.original_text: that I have planted crops again
in the fields that were empty
I, the Lord, have said this
